creator: rsrao.swd@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

I have a problem while converting one of NTA file with Nativeto Ascii conversion. Below are error logs:

[native2ascii] sun.io.MalformedInputException

 conversion failed
        at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.Native2Ascii.convert(Native2Ascii.java:269)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.Native2Ascii.execute(Native2Ascii.java:227)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.UnknownElement.execute(UnknownElement.java:288)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor8.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:391)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.dispatch.DispatchUtils.execute(DispatchUtils.java:105)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.perform(Task.java:348)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:357)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.performTasks(Target.java:385)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeSortedTargets(Project.java:1329)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTarget(Project.java:1298)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.helper.DefaultExecutor.executeTargets(DefaultExecutor.java:41)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTargets(Project.java:1181)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.runBuild(Main.java:698)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.startAnt(Main.java:199)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.launch.Launcher.run(Launcher.java:257)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.launch.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:104)

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
You need to provide the encoding of the "native" file.
The encoding is the default of the platform - which is
platform dependent.

creator: jkf@apache.org
text:
The needed info is:
1) What is the way the native2ascii is used (complete task please).
2) If no encoding is stated there, what is the default encoding of your system.
3) It the file you are trying to convert a text file (and not a binary file, compressed file, .class file, command, library etc. etc.). If it is a binary file, this task cannot be used to convert binary files to text files, please close this report.
4) If it is a text file, what is the encoding of the file? (if it does not match point 1 or, if 1 is not applicalbe point 2, please close this report)

br Martijn
